TopicTitle: Roma Invicta i won Total War Rome 2 main campaign:-)

Articles.Content:
Won main campaigns, it is military victory. In total, I played the easy level, so I should not be so promote, but I'd like to but a little proud,

won the following achievements :-)

Roma Invixta

Their Legacy Lives On

I came, I saw I coquered

In total in the game I spent more than 192 hours of which 65 in the of the past two weeks.

Total War series is the best game series of all time, of course, in addition to the Mass Effect and Kerbal Space Program

For now, I'm going to give up you peace of Rome 2, I have enugh , it hurts me a little head, but I would definitely go back but this time try something else, I bought two DLC "Hannibal at the Gates" and "Caesar in Galia" I do not know where to start?
